Subtitle: Politics & Bureaucratic Capacity - Politics
Subquestion_1: Financing score; where a score of 1 indicates low effectiveness and 5 indicates high effectiveness in terms of adequacy, efficiency, and equity.
Subquestion_2: (Financing) - Adequacy expressed by the per child spending
Subquestion_3: (Financing) Efficiency - Expressed by the score from the Public Expenditure and Financial Accountability (PEFA) assessment; where 0 is the lowest possible efficiency and 1 is the highest
Subquestion_4: (Financing) Efficiency - Expressed by the relationship between financing and outcomes; where 0 is the lowest possible efficiency and 1 is the highest
Subquestion_5: (Financing) - Equity
